data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kerr, Peter H. (2014): The Megophthalmidia (Diptera, Mycetophilidae) of North America including eight new species. ZooKeys 386: 29-83, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.386.6913, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.386.6913
